text: The New Lisbon Correctional Institution is a state prison for men located in New Lisbon, Juneau County, Wisconsin, owned and operated by the Wisconsin Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 2002 and holds 950 inmates at medium security. ==References== Category:Prisons in Wisconsin Category:Buildings and structures in Juneau County, Wisconsin Category:2004 establishments in Wisconsin
title: New Lisbon Correctional Institution
